endpoints.description: Initiate a new creditworthiness assessment for a user or entity.
Retrieve details and outcome of a specific creditworthiness assessment.
List all creditworthiness assessments performed by the user.
Upload necessary financial documents for creditworthiness analysis.
Retrieve comprehensive credit scores associated with a user or entity.
Obtain the historical data and changes related to credit scores.
Access detailed financial reports submitted for a creditworthiness check.
Submit a request for the generation of a detailed financial report.
Retrieve suggested financial products based on the creditworthiness assessment.
Set up customized alerts for changes in credit scores or financial standings.
